//parameter_file_comment: The name of this file. Used for copying inside the workflow
//mapper_comment: Parameter can be either: tanoti or bowtie2
//tanoti_stringency_1_comment: Mapping stringency to use in the first mapping against all references
//tanoti_stringency_2_comment: Mapping stringency to use in the second mapping against specific references
//minAgensRead_comment: Minimum number of reads mapping (after removing duplicates) to the agent to be considered a positive sample
//kraken_all_comment: set to 'false' if skip kraken against entire NCBI database
PlusPFP database compiled by Ben Langmead on 9. December 2022
//kraken_focused_comment: NCBI Hepacivirus genomes with HCV genotypes from NCBI added|
//references_comment: Custom set of HCV fasta files representing different genotypes. 2k1b recombinant added.
//rt_domain_comment: rt-domain of the polymerase. DPOL_HBVD1 in uniprot
